entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
